description: Deletes the specified policy. A policy cannot be deleted if it has non-default versions or it is attached to any certificate. To delete a policy, use the  DeletePolicyVersion action to delete all non-default versions of the policy; use the  DetachPolicy action to detach the policy from any certificate; and then use the DeletePolicy action to delete the policy. When a policy is deleted using DeletePolicy, its default version is deleted with it. Requires permission to access the DeletePolicy action.

parameters.name: policyName
parameters.description: The name of the policy to delete.
